title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Introducing the Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen! This handy tool is a must-have for every household. Made with high-quality stainless steel and PP material, this ice scraper is built to last. 

Available in three vibrant colors - blue, gray, and pink - you can choose the one that suits your style. The compact size of 17x4.5 cm ensures easy storage and handling.

With its sharp stainless steel blade and sturdy PP handle, this ice scraper effortlessly removes ice and frost from your fridge. It is designed to meet all your household requirements and provide exceptional durability.

Each package includes 1 Fridge Ice Scraper, ensuring that you have everything you need to tackle ice build-up effectively. 

Please note that there might be a measurement deviation of 1-5mm due to the manufacturing process. Additionally, the actual color may vary slightly from what is seen on your monitor or due to lighting conditions.
